query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identity_statements (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  coreValues TEXT,
  strengthsAndSkills TEXT,
  idealSelfDescription TEXT,
  lifePurpose TEXT,
  identityStatement TEXT NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ygUAfurMsr4XGZ.9b825a1803c1 --database A6mMgwvSXTxUoWKTdXF6U3 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identity_statements (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  coreValues TEXT,
  strengthsAndSkills TEXT,
  idealSelfDescription TEXT,
  lifePurpose TEXT,
  identityStatement TEXT NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
